column2: there is a lot of hype around Stephanie Izard's restaurants. With Little Goat
column3: it is definitely warranted. I love the food here
column4: especially their fresh bakery bread they make in-house. The avocado toast is the best I've had. The food can tend to be on the heavy side
column5: but you can find lighter options too. The fish tostadas and the salads are all really good
column6: so much flavor. I love the casual vibe here and they're open all day. Great for breakfast or lunch meetings. Service is always friendly and efficient.
